column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Aang , look ! "
#Text=Aang says : " We found the exit ! "
#Text=Katara says : " This is n't the exit . "
#Text=Aang says : " No .
#Text=" Katara says : " These pictures tell their story .

#Text=" Katara says : " They met on top of the mountain that divided their two villages ... " Katara says : " The villages were enemies , so they could not be together ... but their love was strong and they found a way .
#Text=" Katara says : " The two lovers learned earthbending from the badgermoles ; they became the first earthbenders .
#Text=" Katara says : " They built elaborate tunnels , so they could meet secretly .
#Text=Anyone who tried to follow them would be forever in the labyrinth .
#Text=But , one day , the man did n't come - he 'd died in the war between the two villages .
#Text=Devastated , the woman unleashed a terrible display of her earthbending power - she could have destroyed them all ... but , instead , she declared the war over .
#Text=Both villages helped her build a new city where they would live together in peace .
#Text=The woman 's name was Oma and the man 's name was Shu .
#Text=The great city was named Omashu as a monument to their love .
#Text=" Katara says : " Love is brightest in the dark .
#Text=" Moku says : " Oh , great !
#Text=Your plans have led us to another dead end !
#Text="
